ideas.pillar_rationale: This content directly addresses a critical driving safety best practice - tire maintenance - which falls squarely within defensive driving techniques and vehicle safety features. It provides actionable educational content that prevents accidents.
ideas.core_message: Under-inflated tires can add crucial feet to your stopping distance. A monthly tire pressure check takes 5 minutes and could save your life. Earn tokens for maintaining safe driving habits.

variants.generic: Under-inflated tires increase stopping distance. Check pressure monthly to protect your safety and earn tokens.
variants.gig_driver: Delivering all day? Low tire pressure adds stopping distance and burns more gas. Monthly checks = safer stops + token rewards.

Strong engagement potential due to relatability - most drivers neglect tire pressure. Slightly less timely as it's evergreen content rather than trending, but the practical value and safety impact make it strong content. Particularly valuable for gig drivers with high daily mileage.
